name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course prepares first-year graduate students for future research in their respective disciplines. Students are expected to critically examine scholarly papers of their choice as they develop ideas of their own research. Through in-class paper presentations and discussions, they will get to exchange ideas and thus learn from different perspectives. Active participation of all members is strongly encouraged.
schedule:
Week 1    Introduction
Week 3    Two Paper Presentations
Week 5    Two Paper Presentations
Week 7    No Class!
Week 9    Two Paper Presentations
Week 11   Two Paper Presentations
Week 13   Two Paper Presentations
Week 15   Two Paper Presentations
Week 17   Film Discussion

Note: Class meets every other week for 9 times in Spring 2011. Each session starts from 1:10 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. on Tuesday and allows two paper presentations.
scorePolicy:
